Early Career Researcher (ECR) Board.Organization: CASA - Cyber Security in the Age of Large-Scale Adversaries
Early Career Researcher (ECR) Board.Role: The ECR Board decides all funding allocations for the CASA Graduate School (CGS). The board has its own budget and the autonomy to dynamically adapt the programs to the changing needs of ECR members. Representing ECRs in CASA governance, the board organizes activities and meets quarterly to address priorities.

Open Science Ambassador.Organization: Max Planck Institute for Security and Privacy (MPI-SP)
Open Science Ambassador.Role: As representatives of the institute, Open Science Ambassadors raise awareness and provide valuable information to their colleagues about Open Science practices. They meet annually, in person or online, to discuss strategies, participate in workshops, and evaluate the status of Open Science within and beyond the Society.
